about_the_game:
Step into the role of Valkyrie Lilyth and embark on an epic quest to maintain the balance across the Nine Realms. As a goddess, journey to Midgard to recruit warrior souls to aid Asgard in the face of the impending great disaster: the era of Ragnarok.

Explore diverse villages and treacherous, enigmatic dungeons. Engage in battles against formidable monsters with the aid of the Einherjar. Uncover rare treasures and assist mortals in perilous situations.

Key Features

-Classic dungeon-crawling RPG experience.
-Strategic party management and battle tactics.
-A vast array of items and monsters to discover.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has cutscenes with female characters dressed in sexy clothes, like swimsuits

detailed_description:

About the Game

Step into the role of Valkyrie Lilyth and embark on an epic quest to maintain the balance across the Nine Realms. As a goddess, journey to Midgard to recruit warrior souls to aid Asgard in the face of the impending great disaster: the era of Ragnarok.

Explore diverse villages and treacherous, enigmatic dungeons. Engage in battles against formidable monsters with the aid of the Einherjar. Uncover rare treasures and assist mortals in perilous situations.

Key Features

-Classic dungeon-crawling RPG experience.
-Strategic party management and battle tactics.
-A vast array of items and monsters to discover.
name: Valkyrie Eternal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

short_description: Embark on an epic quest as Valkyrie Lilyth to save the Nine Realms from Ragnarok. Recruit powerful warrior souls, explore mysterious dungeons, and battle fierce monsters. Uncover rare treasures and protect mortals in peril.
